official_title: A resolution establishing a procedure for referral of a Vice-Presidential nomination to the Rules Committee and for the addition of six members to the Rules Committee for this nomination.

summary.text: Establishes a procedure for referral of a Vice-Presidential nomination to the Senate Rules Committee and for the addition of six members to the Rules Committee for this nomination.

titles.title: A resolution establishing a procedure for referral of a Vice-Presidential nomination to the Rules Committee and for the addition of six members to the Rules Committee for this nomination.
